text: Titus B. Welliver (born March 12, 1962) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles of the Man in Black in Lost, Silas Adams in Deadwood, Jimmy Oâ€™Phelan in Sons of Anarchy, and the title role in the television series Bosch. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New Haven, Connecticut
